description: Tommy has been so exhausted running around, doing photo and video shoots lately that he needed to catch up on his sleep.</br></br>We found him at his house, still in bed at 1:30pm the other day, so we thought it'd be cool to film him as he awoke. What we didn't know was that he was extra horny from not getting laid the previous night.</br></br>So basically...as we were standing there, we caught him playing with his cock. It makes for a hot scene....</br></br>So enjoy Tommy as he gets himself off after a long, pussyless night.
title: Tommy D Wakes Up Horny
